participant_1.background:
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
i love to paint pictures.
i can type 140 words per minute.
i grew up in the projects of chicago.
I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.

participant_2.background:
I wake up late in the morning, and enjoy a leisurely breakfast with my family.
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
i still live with my parents.
My favorite TV shows are usually medical dramas or comedies, because they're relatable to my job and help me relax.
I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
Hello! My day is going well, thank you! How is yours?
It's going well, thank you! I love painting pictures. Do you have any hobbies?
I love reading my horoscope and writing my own poems. I also enjoy going for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand.
That sounds lovely! I'm glad you have some great hobbies to enjoy.
Thank you! I am too. I am also a teacher. Do you have a job?
I don't currently have a job, but I am looking for one. I am a very fast typist and I love to paint pictures.
That's great! I am sure you will find a job that you love. I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I am proud of my heritage.
That's good to hear! I am sure you will find a job that you enjoy as well. I grew up in the projects of Chicago.
That's interesting! I would love to hear more about your childhood.
Sure! I grew up in a small apartment with my parents and two siblings. We were very poor, but we were always happy.
That sounds like you had a great childhood. I am glad that you were happy.
Thank you! I am glad as well. I hope you have a lovely day!
